adDetails: Hi I fixed curbed alloy wheels.. I am a mobile service and have been in business for 9 years.. I work for dealerships here in the Bay Area.. Here's a picture of a wheel that is an example of the type of rims I repair. I can do small repairs or full repaints. Thank you Rohnert park, Santa Rosa, Windsor, Sonoma, Napa, Petaluma, San Rafael, Marin, San Francisco
